Instruction: Combine water, sugar, and yeast until dissolved. Mix in olive oil and salt. Stir in flour until the dough is well combined. Allow the dough to rest for 10 minutes.

Spread the dough in a pan or on a pizza stone using oiled fingers. You can sprinkle basil, thyme, or other seasonings on the crust if desired. Add your favorite pizza toppings and bake at 425 degrees Fahrenheit for 15 to 20 minutes in a preheated oven.
